title: Correct a Payroll Error
description: An employee reports that their last paycheck was for the wrong amount.

tasks.description: Identify the employee and retrieve their last pay statement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Payroll specialist pulls up the employee's most recent pay stub.

tasks.description: Review the payroll data and identify the error (e.g., incorrect hours entered).
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist finds that the employee's overtime hours were not included.

tasks.description: Process an off-cycle payment to correct the shortfall and explain the resolution to the employee.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist issues a correction payment and clearly communicates the fix to the employee.
